description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**_English II_**  Spring, 2022

**Course Objective**

This course aims to develop students' English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to improve their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension as well as speaking competence through a variety of in-class activities and on-line assignments.

**Textbook**

 World Class Reaings 1: A Reading Skills Text

**Requirements and Rules**

**1\. Regular class attendance is required**. The teacher will check attendance in every class meeting. Students who are absent from the class without proper reasons or formal leave-record will get a **2-final-point deduction** each time. Being late for a class meeting over **30** minutes is treated as an absence. If you are unable to attend the class in case of uncontrollable situations (e.g. illness, emergency, etc.), be sure to get a formal leave-record approved by the school.

**2\. DO NOT** look around or cheat in in-class exercises and exams. If a student is found cheating in an exercise, he/she will get a **zero** in that exercise; cheating in either the **mid-term** or **final exam** will definitely result in failing the course.

**3\. Textbook** is a must. Students should bring the textbook to every class meeting. Violation of this rule will get a **2-final-point deduction** (as an **absence**) each time.

 **4. DO** **NOT** use any electronic devices (except electronic dictionary) such as notebook computers, i-Pads, i-Pods, e-readers or smart phones during class and **exam** time. Violation of this rule will get a **2-final-point deduction** for each violation.

**Grading Policies**

Attendance: **10%**; In-class Exercises and On-line Assignments: **40%**; Mid-term Exam: **25%**; Final Exam: **25%**.

**Bonus Points** 

1\. Using multi-media lab Pu-101 may earn some bonus points (at most **5** final points).

2\. Good study records may help you get extra points in the midterm and final exam.

3\. Attending any English tests/contests given by the school will get some bonus points.
